TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuperTypeMembersSorter extends System.Object

summary.span: Archivia i membri da classi base e interfacce.

span.span: Stores members from base classes and interfaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks I membri che presentano lo stesso nome sono contigui e i membri di pi√π classi derivate precedono i membri di meno classi derivate.Members that have the same name are contiguous, and members from more derived classes precede members from less derived classes.
